article: as workers at car maker opel laid down tools for the sixth straight day on tuesday in protest against job cuts by us parent general motors , management said it hoped to reach a `` joint solution '' with unions to safeguard the group 's german manufacturing facilities .
abstract: opel seeks solution with unions amid europe-wide protests against job cuts
